hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.grievance.report.GrievanceSummary( grievance.id, offender.id, offenderName.lastName, offenderName.firstName, offenderName.middleName, offenderName.suffix, offender.offenderNumber, grievance.grievanceNumber, grievance.openedDate, subject.name, (select status.name from omis.grievance.domain.GrievanceDisposition disposition inner join disposition.status status where disposition.grievance = grievance and disposition.level = 'COORDINATOR'), (select status.name from omis.grievance.domain.GrievanceDisposition disposition inner join disposition.status status where disposition.grievance = grievance and disposition.level = 'WARDEN'), (select status.name from omis.grievance.domain.GrievanceDisposition disposition inner join disposition.status status where disposition.grievance = grievance and disposition.level = 'FHA'), (select status.name from omis.grievance.domain.GrievanceDisposition disposition inner join disposition.status status where disposition.grievance = grievance and disposition.level = 'DIRECTOR'), grievance.description, cast(:effectiveDate as timestamp)) from omis.grievance.domain.Grievance as grievance inner join grievance.offender as offender inner join offender.name as offenderName inner join grievance.subject subject where offender = :offender order by grievance.openedDate desc, grievance.grievanceNumber

select new omis.grievance.report.GrievanceSummary( grievance, offender, offenderName, subject, (select disposition from omis.grievance.domain.GrievanceDisposition disposition where disposition.grievance = grievance and disposition.level = 'COORDINATOR'), (select disposition from omis.grievance.domain.GrievanceDisposition disposition where disposition.grievance = grievance and disposition.level = 'WARDEN'), (select disposition from omis.grievance.domain.GrievanceDisposition disposition where disposition.grievance = grievance and disposition.level = 'FHA'), (select disposition from omis.grievance.domain.GrievanceDisposition disposition where disposition.grievance = grievance and disposition.level = 'DIRECTOR'), cast(:effectiveDate as timestamp)) from omis.grievance.domain.Grievance grievance inner join grievance.offender as offender inner join offender.name as offenderName inner join grievance.location as location inner join grievance.subject as subject where location = :location order by grievance.openedDate desc, grievance.grievanceNumber
